enable_ghost.description: Whether to use gh-ost for online schema migration.

id.description: The unique identifier for the file.

path.description: The path of the file, e.g., `2.2/V0001_create_table.sql`.

sheet.description:
The sheet that holds the content.
 Format: projects/{project}/sheets/{sheet}

sheet_sha256.description: The SHA256 hash value of the sheet.
